column2: Tender chicken breast marinated in a spicy jerk seasoning and grilled to perfection, served with fried plantains and coconut rice.
Tender goat meat cooked in a flavorful curry sauce, served with roti bread, Jamaican cabbage and fried dumplings.

column1: Brown Stew Fish with Rice and Peas
column2: Fresh snapper deep fried and cooked down in brown sauce served with fried plantains, rice and peas.
Tender oxtail slow-cooked in a rich and flavorful stew, served with rice and peas.
